Reviews.Title: Decent camera, Annoyingly bright LED
Reviews.Author: Daniel Miller
Reviews.Content: I have this camera as part of the UBW2101C system, and it has been a great way to keep tabs on the little one. The low-light "night vision" performance is great, since we have blackout shades in the nursery.The irritating part is the blue LED connection indicator. There are 3 LEDs on the front of the camera: a green "power" indicator that is decently bright (enough to navigate the room in the dark), a red "battery low" indicator, and a blue "connection" indicator that is bright enough to throw shadows on the wall, and almost enough to read by. This LED lights up when the monitor is turned on. I had to cover it with multiple layers of tape to keep it from shining so brightly.
